title: View Merged Branches
description: In this lab, you will learn how to view a list of all merged local branches in a Git repository, which is an important task for keeping track of the development process and managing the codebase.

meta.title: View Merged Branches in Git Repository
meta.description: Learn how to view a list of all merged local branches in a Git repository using the command 'git branch -a --merged'.
meta.keywords: git repository, git labs, branches, git, merged branches, git playground, command line

verify.name: Verify for successful view
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.
